channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Air India crash probe focuses on actions of plane's captain, Wall Street Journal reports
1 dead, 13 hurt after lightning strike in Jackson Township, New Jersey
item.description: One person was killed and 13 others were injured after being struck by lightning in Jackson Township, New Jersey, on Wednesday.

item.title: Top Trump administration antitrust official faces criticism over approach, sources say
item.description: Friction within the Trump administration has cropped up with the Justice Department team that fights monopolies, sources tell CBS News.

item.title: WATCH: Raccoon with head stuck in jar rescued by Long Island animal lover
item.description: An animal lover helped out a baby raccoon that was seen roaming a Long Island neighborhood for at least two days with a jar stuck on its head.

item.title: WATCH: History-making 2025 Emmy nominations

item.title: DOJ fires Maurene Comey, who helped prosecute Sean "Diddy" Combs and Jeffrey Epstein
item.description: Maurene Comey is the daughter of former FBI director James Comey, who was terminated by President Trump in 2017.

item.title: ICE data shows less than 1% of deportees had murder convictions

item.title: WATCH: Miley Cyrus on her Disney Legend status
item.description: The singer and actress reflected on her "Hannah Montana" days and more.
